newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka rupee closes firmer vs dollar.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka rupee closes firmer vs dollar.

text.p: The Sri Lanka rupee closed firmer at 55.74 to the dollar on Wednesday after opening at 55.78, dealers said.
"There was no import covering," said a foreign bank dealer. "It was mostly speculation."
The central bank left the exchange rate unchanged with buying and selling prices at 55.3336 and 56.4514 despite slight overseas gains by the currency against the yen, they said.
Overnight call money was at 14 percent after opening at 13.5, they said.
